title: WSB's Weekend Bite: Are Companies Hoarding Labor?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week, Sam Ro, CFA, Founder of TKer newsletter, joins us to discuss labor hoarding, the inflation report, and the infamous meme stock craze. Kim Khan also shares what investors need to watch for next week in regards to the housing market in Catalyst Watch!
